## Project Proposal

Please write a two-page proposal for the class project. The proposal should
contain the following elements:

- Project objective
- Project expectation
- Analysis to be conducted
- Data sources

Please write it in Markdown or R Markdown and submit in both source and pdf
files. Note that each of you will have a git repository for the class project,
please put everything related to the project (proposal, data, code, report) in
that repository.
